price: Wannan ita ce hanya ta Ubangijinka madaidaiciya. Lalle ne Mun bayyana ãyõyi daki-daki ga mutãne mãsu karɓar tunãtarwa.
arabic: وَهَٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسۡتَقِيمٗاۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mus'taqīman qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yadhakkarūna
